passive_1: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of *Steadfast* for 7 seconds, stacking up to 8 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of *Steadfast* every 1 second. At maximum stacks, gain 70 bonus magic resistance and 6% bonus movement speed.

Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of *Steadfast* for 7 seconds, stacking up to 8 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of *Steadfast* every 1 second. At maximum stacks, gain 70 bonus magic resistance and 10% bonus movement speed.

Taking magic damage from enemy champions grants a stack of *Steadfast* for 7 seconds, up to a maximum of 10. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 additional stacks. Spells can only grant 1 stack of *Steadfast* every 1 second.
passive_2: While at maximum stacks of *Steadfast*, gain 10% bonus movement speed and 30 bonus magic resistance.

passive_1: Taking magic damage from enemy champions grants a stack of *Steadfast* for 7 seconds, up to a maximum of 6. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 additional stacks. Spells can only grant 1 stack of *Steadfast* every 1 second.
passive_2: While at maximum stacks of *Steadfast*, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.

passive_1: Taking magic damage from enemy champions grants a stack of *Steadfast* for 5 seconds, up to a maximum of 6. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 additional stacks. Spells can only grant 1 stack of *Steadfast* every 1 second.
passive_2: While at maximum stacks of *Steadfast*, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 20%.

passive_1: Taking ability damage grants you 8 bonus movement speed and 4 bonus magic resistance for 5 seconds, stacks up to 5 times and each unique ability gives 1 stack.
Taking ability damage grants you 6 bonus movement speed and 4 bonus magic resistance for 5 seconds, stacks up to 5 times and each unique ability gives 1 stack.
Restores 1% maximum health per second when below 40% health.
Restores 1.2% maximum health per second when below 50% health.
Restores 1.5% maximum health per second when below 50% health.
